title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 257.3 - Resolution of labor disputes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 257.3 - Resolution of labor disputes

State Regulations

The board delegates to its chairperson, or his or her
designee, the authority to take such steps under sections 702 and 702-a.1 of
SERA deemed expedient and efficient to effectuate a voluntary, amicable and
expeditious adjustment and settlement of the differences and issues between an
employer, labor organization or employees concerning an existing, imminent or
threatened labor dispute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
257.3

Renumbered from 258.3

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
